## Map

Sample map:

```{r}
sites <- st_read("data/Sites_v6.geojson")

leaflet(sites) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>%
  setView(lng = 103.950820, lat = 1.376144, zoom = 15) %>%  # Set center and zoom level
  addPolygons(
    color = "#ff7176",  # Border color for the polygons
    weight = 1,        # Border thickness
    opacity = 1,       # Border opacity
    fillColor = "#ff7176", # Fill color for the polygons
    fillOpacity = 0.5,  # Fill opacity
    popup = ~paste0(
      "<b>Name:</b> ", Project_Name, "<br>",
      "<b>Units:</b> ", Units, "<br>"
      # Add as many attributes as necessary
    )
  )
```
